subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Dan Cleary converted the first postseason penalty shot for Detroit and Henrik Zetterberg scored two power-play goals Saturday in the Red Wings’ 5-1 victory over the Calgary Flames.
snippet: Dan Cleary converted the first postseason penalty shot for Detroit and Henrik Zetterberg scored two power-play goals Saturday in the Red Wings’ 5-1 victory over the Calgary Flames.
